title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1132/86 of 18 April 1986 fixing the storage aid for unprocessed dried grapes and dried figs from the 1985/86 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1132/86
of 18 April 1986
fixing the storage aid for unprocessed dried grapes and dried figs from the 1985/86 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The storage aid referred to in Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 627/85 shall for products from the marketing year 1985/86 be as set out in the Annex.
2. In the case of currants the aid referred to above which is applicable until the end of February 1987 shall, without prejudice to Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 2347/84 (4), be multiplied by 0,972.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 April 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 49, 27. 2. 1986, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 72, 13. 3. 1985, p. 17.
(3) OJ No L 199, 31. 7. 1985, p. 26.
(4) OJ No L 219, 16. 8. 1984, p. 1.
ANNEX
STORAGE AID FOR UNPROCESSED DRIED GRAPES AND DRIED FIGS FROM THE 1985/86 MARKETING YEAR
A. DRIED GRAPES
(ECU per day per 100 kilograms net)
1.2.3 //  //  //  //  // Until the end of February 1987  // From 1 March 1987   //    //   //   // Sultanas category 4  // 0,0529   // 0,0064   //    //   //
B. DRIED FIGS
(ECU per day per 100 kilograms net)
1.2 //  //  // Dried figs category C   // 0,0295   //    //
